en.title: Invitation: Join 10+ Hubs and Explore One IDG Dimension Every Month
en.intro: Getting started is often the hardest part. That's why 10+ existing hubs are inviting you to learn more about a new IDG dimension each month, starting January 2023.
en.story:
Whether you're new to the IDGs or already familiar with the framework, you're invited to join this upcoming theme and learn more about each of the IDG dimensions.

There will be discussions, events and opportunities to learn together with people from different parts of the world.

The first month, we're starting with the Being dimension.
